attributes.action: Should we allow cartoon creator's to create a gay / lesbian cartoon's on children's t.v
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a gay man i think it would be nice to see cartoon makers creat gay / lesbian cartoon's on children's t.v as the goverment are wanting us all to be more politically correct. the makers of television progams ie emmerdale farm and coronation street have bought is gay actor's

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
